did.unittitle: Middle-aged men removing their hats for the camera and looking uncomfortable without them; golf tournament; dedication of a monument to Revolutionary War veterans, erected by the Paintsville, Kentucky chapter of the Daughters of the American Revolution (DAR); aerial footage from an open cockpit plane, no audio

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Black and white 16mm film, no audio track; runtime: 15:36
